main event: A witness in Xenia, Ohio reported seeing a kite-like, bright object with a pulsating glow and rocking motion on June 17, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared brighter than a star and had indistinct edges.
The object had a rocking motion and a pulsating glow.
The witness observed the object for around 30 minutes.
The Air Force requested the witness to complete a questionnaire for further investigation.
The witness described the object as a 'small cloud-like ball'.
sighted object: a kite-like, bright object with a pulsating glow and rocking motion
